SelectTemplate.Caption: Keyword case
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: This option specifies the case of keywords used by Syntax Expansion.

SelectTemplate.Name: LangBeginEndStyle
SelectTemplate.Caption: Begin/end style
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: This option specifies the brace style used by Syntax Indent and Syntax Expansion.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangInsertBracesImmediately
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert braces immediately
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, the template is inserted with braces.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangInsertBlankLineBetweenBraces
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert blank line between braces
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, a blank line is inserted between the braces when a template expands with braces

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangSameLineBraces
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert braces on same line
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, both braces are inserted on the current line, with the cursor between them.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangQuickBrace
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Quick brace/unbrace one line statements
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: This option enables Quick Brace/Unbrace, features which allow you to convert a single line statement to a brace-enclosed block, and vice versa.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangCuddleElse
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Place "else" on same line as "}"
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, the ELSE keyword is placed on the same line as }.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangIndentFirstLevel
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Indent first level of code
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, Syntax Indent indents the cursor after declarations such as functions.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangUseContinuationIndent
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Use continuation indent on function parameters
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, function parameters always use the continuation indent.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangIndentCaseFromSwitch
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Indent CASE from SWITCH
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, Syntax Expansion places the CASE statement indented from the SWITCH statement column.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangNoSpaceBeforeParen
BooleanTemplate.Caption: No space before parenthesis
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, no space is placed between keywords (such as if, for, or while) and the open parenthesis when Syntax Expansion occurs.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangPadParens
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert padding between parentheses
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, a space is placed after the open parenthesis and before the close parenthesis, providing padding for the enclosed text.

SelectTemplate.Name: LangInsertedTagCase
SelectTemplate.Caption: Case for inserted tags
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: This option specifies the case of inserted tags.

SelectTemplate.Name: LangInsertedAttrCase
SelectTemplate.Caption: Case for inserted attributes
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: This option specifies the case of inserted attributes.

SelectTemplate.Name: LangInsertedSWordCase
SelectTemplate.Caption: Case for inserted single word values
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: This option specifies the case of inserted single word values

SelectTemplate.Name: LangInsertedHexCase
SelectTemplate.Caption: Case for hex values
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: This option specifies the case of hexadecimal values.

SelectTemplate.Name: LangEmbeddedASPDialect
SelectTemplate.Caption: Embedded ASP Dialect
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: Specifies the type of ASP that is embedded in your source. This affects embedded language color coding.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangUsePathsForFileEntries
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Use paths for file entries
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: This option is used by the HTML toolbar. When this attribute is selected, path information is included when inserting file names into the value of an attribute.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangUseLowerFileNames
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Use lowercase file names when inserting links
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: This option is used by the HTML toolbar. When this option is selected, the lowercase file names are used when inserting links into the value of an attribute.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangUseQuotesForNums
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Use quotes for numerical values
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, number values are enclosed in double quotes after the equals sign of an attribute inside the body of a tag.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangUseQuotesforSWord
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Use quotes for single word values
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, word values are enclosed in double quotes after the equals sign of an attribute inside the body of a tag.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangInsertColorNames
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert colors using color names (if possible)
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, colors are inserted by using the color names if possible.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangUseDivTags
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Use >DIV< tags for alignment
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: This option is used by the HTML toolbar. When this option is selected, the <DIV> tag is used for aligning text.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangAutoSymbolTranslation
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Auto symbol translation
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When selected, Auto Symbol Translation is enabled, a feature that automatically converts a character or sequence of characters to the appropriate entity reference.

SelectTemplate.Name: LangDefaultFormattingScheme
SelectTemplate.Caption: Default formatting scheme
SelectTemplate.DialogHelp: Specifies the default formatting scheme to use for the selected language.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangContentWrapping
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Enable content wrapping
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When selected, content wrapping is enabled, based on the scheme configuration for the selected formatting scheme.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangTagLayout
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Enable tag layout
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When selected, tag layout is enabled, based on the scheme configuration for the selected formatting scheme.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangAutoValidate
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Auto validate on open
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, files are validated as soon as they are opened.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangCobolNumStyle
BooleanTemplate.Caption: COBOL style (columns 1-6)
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When selected, expect line numbers in columns one through six when renumbering lines.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangSPFNumStyle
BooleanTemplate.Caption: SPF style (columns 73-80)
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When selected, expect line numbers in columns seventy-three through eighty when renumbering lines.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABEnable
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Enable Auto-Close
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: When this option is selected, bracket and quotation punctuations are automatically closed when typed.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABParen
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Parenthesis ( )
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Automatically close typed parenthesis ().

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABParenPad
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert Padding
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Insert padded spaces into auto-closed parenthesis ( ).

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABBracket
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Square Bracket [ ]
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Automatically close typed square bracket [].

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABBracketPad
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert Padding
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Insert padded spaces into auto-closed square bracket [ ].

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABAngle
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Angle Bracket < >
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Automatically close typed angle brackets <>.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABAnglePad
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert Padding
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Insert padded spaces into auto-closed angle brackets < >.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABDoubleQuote
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Double Quote " "
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Automatically close typed angle brackets "".

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABSingleQuote
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Single Quote ' '
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Automatically close typed angle brackets ''.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABBrace
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Brace { }
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Automatically close typed braces {} for supported languages.

BooleanTemplate.Name: LangABBracePad
BooleanTemplate.Caption: Insert Padding
BooleanTemplate.DialogHelp: Insert padded spaces.
